actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide that pledge reminders of charitable organizations may be mailed at third-class rates.

summary.text: Permits the bulk mailing of qualified pledge reminders by nonprofit organizations at third-class rates.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide that pledge reminders of charitable organizations may be mailed at third-class rates.
